concept.title: Change or reset your password
concept.shortdesc: You can change your password for security reasons or reset it if you forget it. Your Google Account password is used to access many Google products, such as Gmail and YouTube

ol.li: Open your Google Account. You might need to sign in.
Under ‘Security’, select Signing in to Google.
Choose Password. You might need to sign in again.
Enter your new password, then select Change password.
